#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long long int n;
int main()
{
	long long int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		long long int merge=0;
		cin>>n;
		while(n>1)
		{
			if(n%2==0)
			{
			   merge+=n/2;
			   n=n/2;
		    }
			else
			 {
			   merge+=(n-1)/2;
			   n=n/2+1;
		    }
			
		}
		cout<<merge<<endl;
	}
}
